com.xwiki.authentication.sts

Class STSErrorCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xwiki.authentication.sts.STSErrorCollector

  • public class STSErrorCollector
extends java.lang.Object
    STSErrorCollector - Class - saves - Throwable objects in List. Have method to convert to string saved errors (listErrors()). Have errorList, which is ArrayList in which are stored Errors. You can easily add Throwable objects with void addError(Object obj). If will be passed non-Throwable object to method - nothing will happen.
    Version:
    1.0

      private java.util.List<java.lang.Throwable> errorList
      List of Throwable objects to store current errors
